name: image-crop-generator
description: Crop your images after uploading them to the server.
author: Jo√£o Pedro Conte

scripts.start: yarn clean && tsc --outDir src/bundle; parcel src/index.html
scripts.publicate: cp ./dist/cropped.js . && cp ./dist/cropped.d.ts . && mv cropped.js index.js && mv cropped.d.ts index.d.ts &&  npm publish --access public && rm -rf index.js && rm -rf index.d.ts
